title: AI-Driven Digital Immersion Science English Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific terminology and elementary English proficiency
context.additional_context: A course for workplace learners to enhance practical English skills in science domains.

learning_goals: Interact with AI-based language models to demonstrate 20 everyday scientific expressions with 80% accuracy.
Pass an assessment evaluating the ability to apply 50 scientific terms contextually in virtual experiments using digital agents.
Pass an evaluation assessing the ability to write scientific reports using generative AI tools and incorporate peer review feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
